wikitext.*:
'''CRL Group PLC''' was the company that developed ''[[Bored of the Rings (video game)|Bored of the Rings]]''<ref>[http://www.worldofspectrum.org/infoseekid.cgi?id=0006036 Bored of the Rings] at [[Wikipedia:World of Spectrum|World of Spectrum]] (retrieved 22 September 2010)</ref><ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/bored.html Bored of the Rings] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 22 September 2010)</ref> and ''[[The Boggit]]'',<ref>[http://www.worldofspectrum.org/infoseek.cgi The Boggit] at [[wikipedia:World of Spectrum|World of Spectrum]] (retrieved 22 September 2010)</ref><ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/boggit.html The Boggit] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 22 September 2010)</ref> which together constitute the ''[[Hairy Toes]]'' series.
